projects.name: Nefuen Trading Website

projects.description: CMS (Content Management System) developed for Nefuen Trading company, designed to manage the content of their website.

projects.name: Space tourism

works.subtitle: Professional Internship
works.activities: Proactive participation in meetings. Development of projects in PHP-Laravel. Front-end development using HTML, Vue, Bootstrap, and CSS. Providing quality control assistance to internal developers. Creation and execution of test cases.

education.subtitle: Technical Professional Degree
education.activities: Backend development with PHP. Frontend development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Mobile development with Java.

education.titleFront: Master in Full Stack Web: Angular, Node, Laravel, Symfony +
education.subtitle: Online Course
education.activities: Backend development with Laravel, Symfony, and Node. Frontend development with HTML, CSS, and Angular. Development of Single Page Applications (SPA), dynamic and reactive web applications. Development of RESTful APIs for independent back-end separation from the front-end or client.
